title: How to Make Peppermint Meringue

steps.headline: Arrange oven racks to divide oven into thirds.
Line two cookie sheets with foil.
In a large bowl, beat egg whites, salt and cream of tartar until peaks appear.
Gradually add sugar and beat at medium speed for 5 to 6 minutes.
Meringues should look dry and white.
steps.description: Turn off oven. Keep door ajar and let meringues cool.

steps.headline: Loosen from foil with metal spatula.
Store loosely covered in a dry place.

text: Arrange oven racks to divide oven into thirds.  Heat to 225ºF/110ºC.  Line two cookie sheets with foil.  In a large bowl, beat egg whites, salt and cream of tartar until peaks appear.  Gradually add sugar and beat at medium speed for 5 to 6 minutes.  Drop teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets.  Sprinkle with crushed candy.  Bake 1 1/2 hours.  Meringues should look dry and white. Turn off oven. Keep door ajar and let meringues cool. Loosen from foil with metal spatula.  Store loosely covered in a dry place.
